title: [[斩/插百]]96/100
author: qsefthuopq
txt_content:
从我一开始就接手的大坑Towny来看，我入坑插件翻译也快一年了 




QQ截图20181128200640.jpg (286.38 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2018-11-28 20:34 上传





我翻译的起点就是Towny,我玩Minecraft最初接触的插件也是Towny


这些插件中有些我已经弃坑了，也有撞车的、还没填完坑的、凑数的大部分是添加了有趣机制的中小型插件 少部分为插件介绍+WIKI翻译

总之也快凑够一百个了 凑齐一百个就发锭 
不过我的金粒都用来顶以前的服务器帖了，现在穷得一百块锭都没有 那就只能发50个了

TownyMythicMobsExtensionCrazyEnchantmentsPlayerParticlesTShockTShock/WorldEditMythicMobs/论坛教程InvasionSensibleToolbox(弃坑)SlimeXpansionDragoneggdropRevivalPinataMythicDropsRegioneratorCaulCraftingHotbarPetsBedHomeSlimefunTownySlimefunUncrafter?DiablodDropsPiggyBackCameraObscuraDragonTravelRunecraft/教程MagicSpellsTowny/教程RegionNBS?RegionTitleReloadedRegioneratorServerTutorialPlusNametagEditMagespell(弃坑)WorldEditGlobalizerWorldSchematics2(弃坑)ChatItemTownyTitleMoneyPrintersTownyTitleTechFunTechFun/English-PageInventoryRollbackMagicMirrorEliteMobsAdvancedSlabsAdvancedElectricityAdvancedMobArenaTownyGUITowny MailSponsored SlotsOldCombatMechanicsRolCardsDeadSocietySpaciousLibDark NightsWorlEditCUIInvUnloadChestSortCaptchaCitizensProdigyDisasterProdigyNightClubSecond ChanceScubaHelmetTotemPlusQuestCreatorBeautyQuestsPyrCorePyrSlotMachinePyrParticlesCitizensTextIControlUCarzEnvironmentalAwarenessCustomCommandsOldDaysObsidianWalkerFarLandsAgainTicTacToeLeaderHeadsLavaSpongeSelection VisualizerPwnChickenLayKillerMoneyFallAvertPlayerMirrorAspectXWeatherBillboardsEliteMobsCitizensDiamond GuaranteeSnowballDamageMaster ModeClicksPerSecondAngelChestSeasonsNPCDestinations


凑够100个我就该沉迷学习了 有空就填坑.



当然我不会弃坑 待我翻译的插件还有很多

replies.author: MC_tingfeng
replies.txt_content: 膜拜大佬，之前为了自己的服务器翻译了一个环境科技mod就已经感觉够累的了，好像是400多条。无奈网上的汉化在最新版有些不适用以及不完全，就索性自己从头翻译了一遍
